page.title: 18HARRIS COACHES
page.content: Harris coaches have been operating from Summercourt for 20 years.Before that they were centred in the nearby village of Fraddon.There are 7 coaches with 8 men employed.There are 4 fulltime drivers,3 part time and 1 fitter.They run services from St. Stephens to Truro daily,Wednesdays and Saturdays from St.Columb to Truro, Fridays from St.Eval to Truro,Tuesdays St.Dennis to Truro and in Summer time every Thursday they run to Plymouth while in winter once a month on Thursdays.They have school and local club contracts which occupy the coaches fully.The new garage has been used for 4 years.The cost of the services offered are very reasonably priced,for example,from St.Columb to Truro is one pound return which covers a distance of 30 miles.
